html: Him. In the form of a dove, John i. 32. (Haydock)— "The whole fountain of the Holy Ghost descending." (Ev. Nazar.) (St. Jerome)— Christ was filled with his seven gifts, andof his fullness his servantsreceive. (Worthington)— Yet all virtues are the gifts of the holy Spirit, and the number seven is not specified in Hebrew, as the same word (Calmet)yirath, is renderedgodliness, which (ver. 3.) means, the fear of the Lord. (Haydock)— God enables us to penetrate the difficulties of Scripture, and to act with prudence, &c. (Menochius)
